title: Nunavut Cultural Portal
text: Logo and website templates for cultural resource portal.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Visual Studio, Illustrator

title: Markerstudy Intervention App (MIA)
text: Insurance web app, built in AngularJS, the styling was based on the Angular Material framework with the addition of many custom built elements.
details: AngularJS, jQuery, JavaScript, C#, Angular Material, HTML, SCSS, CSS, Visual Studio, Illustrator

title: Wild Turnbull
text: Logo and single page website for chartered accountants Wild Turnbull.

title: Auto Windscreens
text: I was asked to produce a new responsive design and templates for the website. A major part of the work was the design and development of a complex multi-step javascript booking form. I created a series of form templates, using jQuery and incorporating clickable SVG elements to gather information about damaged auto glass. I also textured and rendered a 3D model of a van from their new fleet.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SVG, Illustrator, Fireworks, Visual Studio, Blender

title: Big Data
text: Animated slides for a presentation about big data, I used a 1950's style to illustrate various points arround the theme of the nuclear family.

title: Zenith Aviation
text: Website for the private jet charter company, developed a flight booking form in JavaScript, incorporating Bootstrap's Typeahead and Date/Time Picker.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, LESS CSS, Fireworks, Visual Studio

title: Lancaster Insurance
text: Designed and produced a Bootstrap website template, the theme had to incoprporate certain vintage elements but still maintain a current look and feel.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C#

title: Painting Gallery
text: My very own artwork portfolio site built in AngularJS with a customised Angular Material framework.
details: AngularJS, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, SCSS, CSS, Blogger API

title: SCANS - FNOL
text: For Markerstudy Insurance Group's new FNOL (First Notification of Loss) app I designed the layout, created templates and as part of a development team integrated them into the new app designed to capture accident details when a claim is first called in.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, LESS, CSS, C#, Illustrator, Visual Studio

title: Petwise Health Insurance
text: Responsive website design was intended to give a freindly face to a lot of insurance jargon, including things like policy comparison tables and a quoting system.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, LESS, CSS

title: 39 Charles Street
text: Design and build of a single page scrolling website for a prestigious real estate development in central London.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, LESS, CSS, Google Maps

title: NDGA
text: I designed and produced responsive templates for the Next Dimension Gymnastics Academy.
details: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, LESS, CSS

title: CentriNet
text: I was commissioned to create a completely new logo and website for IT Security firm CentriNet. for the logo I used interlocking shapes derived from the lowercase 'c' and 'n' of the company name to form an abstract shape reminiscent of a chain link.
details: Wordpress, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Fireworks, Illustrator

title: BLACK
text: Produced the level selection screens and in game HUD (head-up display) for the revolutionary shoot 'em up 'BLACK' by Criterion Games (published by EA Games).

title: Smartbunker
text: I was asked to design a logo and website for the secure datacenter situated in a decomissioned nuclear bunker. I also created a 3D rendered interactive animation to illustrate the features of the unique datacenter.
details: Wordpress, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Blender, Flash, Fireworks

title: Harry Potter & the Goblet of Fire
text: EA Games hired me to redesign the selection and setting screens for the Sony PSP version of their soon to be released video game. I also produced graphics for a selection of mini games exclusive to the PSP version of the title.
